alert.note: Alert for Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 10:42AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A line of heavy showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Windham, southeastern Worcester, southwestern Norfolk, central Middlesex, western Bristol, Washington, Newport, Kent, Providence and Bristol Counties through 1130 AM EST... At 1036 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of heavy showers and isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dudley to 18 miles southeast of Montauk Point. Movement was north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 60 mph & brief torrential downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will cause damage such as downed branches and result in power outages. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Providence, Fall River, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, Framingham, East Providence, Woonsocket, Marlborough, Shrewsbury, Coventry, Cumberland, Natick, North Providence, Franklin, South Kingstown, West Warwick, Johnston, and North Attleborough. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
